title: SOLD: a rough pair of Polar Bears, Stanage & Kruger...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: SOLD: a rough pair of Polar Bears, Stanage & Kruger...
posts.post_content:
Low grade pair of T206 PBs.  Oscar Stanage and Otto Kruger of Kruger Industrial Smoothing.

Commitment to purchase outweighs any ongoing negotiations. :rolleyes:

[url]seablaster@yahoo.com[/url]

[url]www.collectorfocus.com/collection/seablaster[/url]

are they torn or just heavily creased? Thanks!
Ed

[quote name="Ed_Hutchinson" post=1965358]are they torn or just heavily creased? Thanks!
Ed[/QUOTE]

Valid question Ed.

The Stanage is creased with minimal paper loss in the upper corners on the front.  The Kruger, although that is a heavy crease dead center, about 3 mm of it is a tear.  It goes from the top border and stops above his hair.

[quote name="seablaster" post=1965387]Valid question Ed.

The Stanage is creased with minimal paper loss in the upper corners on the front.  The Kruger, although that is a heavy crease dead center, about 3 mm of it is a tear.  It goes from the top border and stops above his hair.[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the descriptions. While I dont mind paper loss on my T206s I do stay away from tears and missing pieces of the card. For that reason I will pass on the lot, however if you decide to break it up, I am a buyer on the Stanage at 17 shipped PWE. Either way, have a great night!

Ed
